result.title: Buffett's Berkshire ends 17-year bet on BYD as China carmaker trims sales target
result.text: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway has sold its entire holding in Chinese electric vehicle maker BYD Co (HKG:1211, LSE:0HKY, OTCQX:BYDDY)after a 17-year investment estimate to have made the business over $4b billion. Berkshire first invested in BYD in 2008, buying a 10% stake for $230 million.

result.title: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway exits China's BYD, filing shows
result.text: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway has fully exited Chinese automaker BYD , a filing showed, ending a 17-year investment that grew over 20-fold in value in that period.
